segments.text: Hello , miss . I would like to check out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sir . If you want to check out now , we will charge you $ 200 as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? I have stayed for 3 nights .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the check out time is 12:00 o'clock everyday , if you checked out after 15:00 , we have to charge you for another day .
segments.speaker: S2
